text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Curfew's so annoying. Sometimes I want to talk with you more, especially before a race.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: I don't live in the dorms, but I still have to leave campus by curfew……

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Ah, I know. You can just come over to my place. No curfew there.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that sounds good! I'm starting to look forward to us talking more and all the races ahead now!
